Body:
pattern = ci_pattern.CIPatternUniform(normalization=1.0, regions=[(0, 3, 1, 4)]
    )
frame = ci_frame.ChInj(frame_geometry=ci_frame.FrameGeometry.
    euclid_bottom_right(), ci_pattern=pattern)
mask = ci_mask.CIMask.masked_serial_trails_from_ci_frame(shape=(3, 10),
    ci_frame=frame, columns=(0, 1))
assert type(mask) == ci_mask.CIMask
assert (mask == np.array([[True, False, False, False, False, False, False, 
    False, False, False], [True, False, False, False, False, False, False, 
    False, False, False], [True, False, False, False, False, False, False, 
    False, False, False]])).all()
